commit.message:
set PW_KEY_NODE_ALWAYS_PROCESS to avoid freeze on paused source

this resolves #556
fix source being ignored when using pipewire
build fix, remove unused parameter #484

pulse: clean up confusion regarding buffer size and fragsize

now these are set to the same value
earlier frag_size was set to doble buffer size  because of cpu performance issues

but this was causing some issues with the recording
add waveform visualization #484
add option to remove idle bar heads #550
bump hardcoded version to  0.10.1

commit.message:
#354 prioritize pulseaudio before sndio

on arch some people seem to have sndio installed but not pipewire. Therefore cava defaults to sndio.

#538

#354 prioritize pulseaudio before sndio

#538

commit.message: Correct minor error in sndio documentation

Sndio: configurable parameters

- rework sndio backend to accept variable parameters
- enhance documentation
JACK: add autoconnect option for automatic port connections

JACK support

- JACK input backend support
- JACK priority after sndio (and both after pipewire)
- doc: extended documentation in README.md
- fix getPulseDefaultSink compilation warning
bumped hardcoded version to 0.10.0

commit.message: Limit OSS to FreeBSD build

OSS input backend and general improved FreeBSD support

- OSS: add 'enable-oss-input' configure option
- OSS: set to default input method if enabled
- sndio: add to input method selection sequence with high priority
- sndio: fix small bug in channel setting
- FreeBSD: add 'enable-cava-font' configure option, which creates vt(4) font cava.fnt from cava.psf
- doc: extended documentation in example config file and in README.md
Fixed a memory overrun when gradient_count > 8
make cavacore an actual library with cmake #487
make pipewire default if supported
make audio rate and format configurable also for pipewire

re-implement keyboard commands in noncurses #536

uses read() with VMIN and VTIME set to 0

have yet to notice the same issues we had with #379

use noncurses by default

Uses less resources and is less prone to tearing (vsync issues) than 'ncurses'
disable blanking, for real this time
added info on alsa dmix #534

make disable console blank optional

and dont enable it if disabled, this closes #535

add sdl full screen option as mentioned in #531

also added quit on q or escape
Update README.md
